scripts.start:dev: cd node-vue-prisma/backend && npm run dev & cd ../frontend && npm run dev
scripts.vercel-build: npm install --prefix node-vue-prisma/frontend && npm run build --prefix node-vue-prisma/frontend
scripts.postinstall: node -e "if (process.env.VERCEL) { console.log('Skipping postinstall on Vercel'); process.exit(0); } const { execSync } = require('child_process'); execSync('cd node-vue-prisma/backend && npm install', { stdio: 'inherit' }); execSync('cd node-vue-prisma/frontend && npm install && npm run build', { stdio: 'inherit' });"
